verses.text: Now when Jesus was born in Bethlehem of Judaea in the days of Herod the king, behold, there came wise men from the east to Jerusalem,

similars.text: And it came to pass in those days, that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee, and was baptized of John in Jordan.
And Joseph also went up from Galilee, out of the city of Nazareth, into Judaea, unto the city of David, which is called Bethlehem; (because he was of the house and lineage of David:)
And they said unto him, In Bethlehem of Judaea: for thus it is written by the prophet,

verses.text: Saying, Where is he that is born King of the Jews? for we have seen his star in the east, and are come to worship him.
When Herod the king had heard these things, he was troubled, and all Jerusalem with him.

similars.text: But when king David heard of all these things, he was very wroth.
At that time Herod the tetrarch heard of the fame of Jesus,

verses.text: And when he had gathered all the chief priests and scribes of the people together, he demanded of them where Christ should be born.

similars.text: And Pilate, when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people,

verses.text: And they said unto him, In Bethlehem of Judaea: for thus it is written by the prophet,

similars.text: And to this agree the words of the prophets; as it is written,

Now when Jesus was born in Bethlehem of Judaea in the days of Herod the king, behold, there came wise men from the east to Jerusalem,

verses.text: And thou Bethlehem, in the land of Juda, art not the least among the princes of Juda: for out of thee shall come a Governor, that shall rule my people Israel.

similars.text: But thou, Beth-lehem Ephratah, though thou be little among the thousands of Judah, yet out of thee shall he come forth unto me that is to be ruler in Israel; whose goings forth have been from of old, from everlasting.

verses.text: Then Herod, when he had privily called the wise men, inquired of them diligently what time the star appeared.
And he sent them to Bethlehem, and said, Go and search diligently for the young child; and when ye have found him, bring me word again, that I may come and worship him also.

similars.text: And when they were come into the house, they saw the young child with Mary his mother, and fell down, and worshipped him: and when they had opened their treasures, they presented unto him gifts; gold, and frankincense, and myrrh.

verses.text: When they had heard the king, they departed; and, lo, the star, which they saw in the east, went before them, till it came and stood over where the young child was.
When they saw the star, they rejoiced with exceeding great joy.

similars.text: Yea, and behold, Abraham saw of his coming, and was filled with gladness and did rejoice.
Yea, and he also saw that their hearts were lifted up unto great boasting, in their pride.
For they knew not what to think; for when they beheld those that had been delivered out of bondage they were filled with exceedingly great joy.

verses.text: And when they were come into the house, they saw the young child with Mary his mother, and fell down, and worshipped him: and when they had opened their treasures, they presented unto him gifts; gold, and frankincense, and myrrh.

similars.text: And he sent them to Bethlehem, and said, Go and search diligently for the young child; and when ye have found him, bring me word again, that I may come and worship him also.

verses.text: And being warned of God in a dream that they should not return to Herod, they departed into their own country another way.

similars.text: But when he heard that Archelaus did reign in Judaea in the room of his father Herod, he was afraid to go thither: notwithstanding, being warned of God in a dream, he turned aside into the parts of Galilee:
